title: 820-3115 3v3_s5 short to ground
message: so 3v3_s5 seems to be shorted to ground i get a beep on my meter but when i inject voltage my power supply doesnt helkp me find it. must be too small of a short to be detected? what other tricks can i use?

title: 820-3115 3v3_s5 short to ground
message:
Beep is not equal short.
Which is the exact value, on diode scale; red probe to ground, also black to ground.
Usual DC multimeters beep until 060-075, which is not short at all...

Post PPBUS_G3H and 3V42 voltage.
Do you get magsafe light?

title: 820-3115 3v3_s5 short to ground
message:
ppbus_g3h and 3v42 are present with a green light on charger.

on 3v3_s5 i get a beep at 23ohm and dropping

and on diode mode i get 0.013v on 3v3_s5

title: 820-3115 3v3_s5 short to ground
message:
That is low value, but insufficient to heat anything if inject voltage.
Confirm you are NOT measuring diode scale on powered board.
Also remember, always wait 15-20s after power removed, before do any continuity measure on board...

title: 820-3115 3v3_s5 short to ground
message: Yeah as 2informaticos said disconnect power for 15-20 seconds then measure resistance to ground on 3v3_S5 again without power applied. If it's still short, inject 3.3 volts into that line. There should absolutely be current draw on a low resistance short might be hard to find it. You can increase amperage to 4 or 5 amps if you power supply allows it.

title: 820-3115 3v3_s5 short to ground
message:
i was able to find some shorted components by leaving magsafe on while injecting voltage i replaced a couple components that went to the same line now i do get voltage on 3v3_s5 but it fluctuates a lot. it goes as far back as r6990 on pin 2. Replaced d6990 but no change r6990 is at proper resistance no change.

removed smc but i still get fluctuation. bad pch?

any further ideas?

title: 820-3115 3v3_s5 short to ground
message: If you injected voltage with charger connected, probably the board is trash now...

title: 820-3115 3v3_s5 short to ground
message: maybe, ill have to test it but i got it to turn on at least. u6610 was shorting the board.

title: 820-3115 3v3_s5 short to ground
message: Yeah never ever EVER inject voltage with the charger plugged in. This is prob dead now.

title: 820-3115 3v3_s5 short to ground
message: i guess i got lucky. board is working fine.
